name: Lost In The Flames
description:
A Ludum Dare 43 Compo Game.

Ludum Dare Link: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/43/lost-in-the-flames

Rush into a burning building and grab as many of the sentimental items as possible. Sacrifice the unimportant and replaceable objects, and get back out before it gets too hot!

Game time is around 1 minute!
